item.title: How I Found Myself doing Data science in marketing
item.description: Since February 26 i am working at Seedstars Ivory Coast in a venture named Bora digital who works mostly in marketing and digital marketing…

item.title: How to follow and engage with the R community
item.description: “R is not just a programming language, but it is also an interactive environment for doing data science.” “Investing a little time in learning R each day will pay off handsomely in the long run.”- Hadley Wickham and Garret Grolemund in R for Data Science…
